exceptions.tactic: exists (fun x => if x <? n then Some None else None).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type n : nat h : stream A The term "fun x : nat => if x <? n then Some None else None" has type "forall x : nat, option (option ?A)" while it is expected to have type "nat -> option A".

original: exists (fun x => if x <? n then Some None else None). intros x y Hxy Heq. apply Nat.ltb_lt in Hxy. rewrite Nat.ltb_ge. destruct (x <? n) eqn:Hx; destruct (y <? n) eqn:Hy. - auto. - apply Nat.ltb_ge in Hy. lia. - auto. - lia.
